title: BBQ/Picnic Area, Dog Park, Hammock Park, Whirlpool Appliances
posting_body: ['Welcome To The Palms at Peccole Ranch Apartments', 'Come home to Palms at Peccole Ranch Apartments in West Las Vegas.', 'With 1 bedroom apartments, 2 bedroom apartments, and 3 bedroom apartments, you will have the opportunity to choose the layout that is best for you.', 'Our Summerlin apartments are located in a convenient spot, with beautiful scenery, and one-of-a-kind local attractions.', 'Find yourself diving into a life that is both welcoming and luxurious.', 'Our apartments in Summerlin Las Vegas are where the hub of stunning landscapes meets better living.', 'Here, you will find the ideal combination of personal and community amenities that will help you to always feel right at home.', 'At our apartments in West Charleston, you can enjoy plenty of space to relax, rejuvenate in, and experience ultimate at-home comfort.', 'Join our community today, and find the entire world at your fingertips.', 'Choose The Palms at Peccole today.', 'Call Now:', 'show
